entry.title: Monday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
